Pre-Game Insights: Brazil enters Copa America 2024 with the second-best odds of winning the trophy.
Brazil is expected to win against Costa Rica despite missing key players like Neymar, Gabriel Jesus, Casemiro, and Thiago Silva.
Costa Rica has a history of pulling off big-time upsets, making them a challenging opponent.
Vinicius Jr. is anticipated to be a standout player for Brazil, coming off a successful season with Real Madrid.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will take place at SoFi Stadium in Inglewood, CA.
The game is scheduled for Monday, June 24, 2024, at 9:00 p.m. ET and will be broadcast on FS1.
